thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Agilent Technologies Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.63

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Agilent Technologies Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.63
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Agilent Technologies Inc:
* AGILENT TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS SECOND-QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q3 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.61 TO $0.63
* SEES Q3 2018 REVENUE $1.185 BILLION TO $1.205 BILLION * Q2 REVENUE $1.21 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.21 BILLION
* Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.65
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $4.85 BILLION TO $4.87 BILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.64 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REAFFIRMING FULL YEAR GUIDANCE * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.65, REVENUE VIEW $1.21 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.70, REVENUE VIEW $4.92 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
